title: Linux ftp Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux ftp command with practical examples, including connecting to an FTP server, transferring files and directories, and understanding the basics of File Transfer Protocol.

meta.title: Linux ftp Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux ftp command with practical examples, including connecting to an FTP server, transferring files and directories, and understanding the basics of File Transfer Protocol.
meta.keywords: Linux, ftp, file transfer, networking, communication, FTP server, file management

verify.name: Verify FTP understanding
verify.hint: Please review the information provided in the "Introduction to FTP (File Transfer Protocol)" step and ensure you understand the basic concepts of FTP.

steps.title: Connecting to an FTP Server Using the ftp Command

verify.name: Verify FTP connection
verify.hint: Ensure you can successfully connect to the FTP server using the `ftp` command. Check the output for the "Login successful" message.

steps.title: Transferring Files and Directories with FTP

verify.name: Verify file upload
verify.hint: Ensure you can successfully upload a file to the remote FTP server using the `put` command.

verify.name: Verify file download
verify.hint: Ensure you can successfully download a file from the remote FTP server using the `get` command.
